name: TEDFIELD
description:
My submission for Jonas Tyroller's Wowie Jam 4.0.

Astronaut C. Tedfield crashed his spaceship on an undiscovered planet. Fortunately, he comes across the AI called G1G4-BRAIN. The AI helps him repair the spaceship. But was the crash really an accident?

Controls:

Gamepad

Move: Left Stick
Jump: A / X
Action: A / X
Change Camera Speed: Shoulder Buttons
Quit Game: Hold Select (3 seconds)

Mouse/Keyboard

Move: W, A, S, D
Jump: Space
Action: Space
Change Camera Speed: Arrow Keys
Quit Game: Hold Esc (3 seconds)

#madewithunity 2021.3 LTS #WowieJam4

Note: This game is a demanding 3D application. Powerful hardware is recommended. Parts of the game's cover image were created by Midjourney AI. This game contains purchased assets from the Unity Asset Store.
